text: ila anu: " O grantha prajalara! Maku mariyu miku madhya um'madiga unna dharma visayam (uttaruvu) vaipunaku randi, adi emitante: 'Manam allah tappa marevvarini aradhincaradu, ayanaku bhagasvamulanu evvarini nilabettaradu mariyu allah tappa, manavarilo nundi evvarini prabhuvuluga cesukoradu." Varu (sam'matincaka) tirigi pote: "Memu niscayanga allah ku vidheyulamu (muslinlamu), diniki miru saksuluga undandi." Ani paluku
